posts.title: Introduction to JSON
posts.content: JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is a lightweight data-interchange format.

posts.title: Getting Started with Node.js
posts.content: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

posts.title: Understanding RESTful APIs
posts.content: REST (Representational State Transfer) is an architectural style for distributed hypermedia systems.

posts.title: Exploring JavaScript ES6 Features
posts.content: ES6 introduces several new features to JavaScript, such as arrow functions and promises.

posts.title: Web Development Trends in 2025
posts.content: In 2025, modern web development will continue evolving with technologies like WebAssembly and serverless architecture.
